Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 2 Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka » 2.2 Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka » 2.2.1 Sahetukapada » 2.2.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Sahetukaduka
Sahetukapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
1.
922Kusalaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
923Akusalaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
924Abyākataṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2.
925Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
926Naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
927Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
928Naadhipatipaccayā hetuyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
929(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Hetu-ārammaṇa >>
